summary: This is an email chain from July 10, 2019, discussing the need for assistance from C20 (likely an FBI or law enforcement unit) to execute a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence for digital media and computer equipment. Most of the unit is in Florida interviewing victims.

persons.name: SSA
persons.context: CC'ed on the email requesting assistance for the search warrant execution at Epstein's residence.

events.title: Planned search warrant execution at Epstein's Manhattan residence
events.description: C20 (law enforcement unit) plans to execute a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence in Manhattan for digital media and computer equipment.

events.title: C20 interviewing victims in Florida
events.description: Most of the C20 unit is in Florida conducting interviews with victims.

keyFacts: A search warrant for digital media and computer equipment was planned for Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence on July 11, 2019.
Most of the C20 law enforcement unit was in Florida interviewing victims at the time, requiring additional assistance for the New York operation.
The email indicates active, parallel investigations in multiple locations (New York and Florida) shortly before Epstein's arrest in July 2019.
